title: The Buzz
content: I'm hearing [they](https://controlroom.blogspot.com/2021/01/postmortem.html) just wanted "a few more days" to get to the bottom of these allegations, a rerun of Pizzagate in 2016 in a lot of ways. Giuliani and Sydney Powell were always making it seem like the big revelation was coming tomorrow. Just like 2016: stay tuned, and we'll have proof Hillary is Spawn of Satan. This kind of short term myopic "tomorrow is the apocalypse" science fiction, is worth mocking I think.
author: Kirby Urner
